subject: Coaches and Managers
Basketball
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Rubin became the coach of the 1972-73 Philadelphia 76ers after a former assistant recommended him. He was fired after a 4-47 start, and the team finished 9-73.
snippet: Mr. Rubin became the coach of the 1972-73 Philadelphia 76ers after a former assistant recommended him. He was fired after a 4-47 start, and the team finished 9-73.
